ABOUT.TITLE: About us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: At MogaSoft, we're more than just a tech company—we're your innovation partner. We specialize in providing smart, integrated solutions in technology, consulting, and project management, helping businesses enhance efficiency, optimize performance, and stay ahead in the digital world.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: We blend cutting-edge software with advanced hardware to create tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of every client.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_3: Whether it’s web and mobile development, strategic consulting, or AI-driven insights, our expert team is dedicated to delivering real, impactful results. Technology is constantly evolving, and so are we.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_4: That’s why we offer advanced platforms, AI solutions, and data analytics to help businesses unlock their full potential and make the most of their digital investments. At MogaSoft, we believe in innovation, collaboration, and long-term success. Let’s shape the future together!

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.WHO_DESC: At Mogasoft, we turn technology into powerful business solutions. From custom software and IT infrastructure to embedded systems, we create smart, secure, and scalable technology that helps businesses grow and innovate in a digital world.
ABOUT_US.MISSION_DESC: We’re on a mission to bridge technology and business growth. By creating scalable, secure, and intelligent solutions, we help businesses streamline operations, enhance security, and stay ahead in a fast-moving digital landscape.
ABOUT_US.VISION_DESC: We envision a future where technology fuels limitless possibilities. Our goal is to be a driving force in digital transformation, empowering businesses with cutting-edge solutions that ensure they’re always one step ahead.
ABOUT_US.TEAM_SUBTITLE: Meet the innovators behind Mogasoft's success!

privacy.TITLE: Privacy Policy
privacy.INTRO_TEXT: Welcome to Mogasoft. Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

COLLECT_LIST.PERSONAL: Personal details (e.g., name, email, phone number).
COLLECT_LIST.BROWSING: Browsing data (e.g., IP address, browser type).
COLLECT_LIST.CONTACT: Any information you provide when you contact us.

privacy.SECURITY_TEXT: Your personal information is secured with encrypted access via password-protected sessions. The session ends once you log out. We restrict access to authorized employees, such as customer service representatives, to fulfill specific tasks only.
privacy.USAGE_TEXT: Some of the services and products provided may involve marketing via email, phone messages, and other advertising platforms. Additionally, we may use your personal data to promote other offers and services based on your account settings.
privacy.SHARING_TEXT: We do not share or sell your personal information to any third parties.
privacy.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at:

ACCOUNT_ELIGIBILITY.TITLE: Account Eligibility
ACCOUNT_ELIGIBILITY.CONTENT: To open an account, you must be at least 18 years old and provide accurate information.

ACCOUNT_SECURITY.TITLE: Account Security
ACCOUNT_SECURITY.CONTENT: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login details.

TRANSFER_TO_COMPANY.TITLE: Transfer to the Company
TRANSFER_TO_COMPANY.CONTENT: By using our services, you grant us permission to manage your technical requirements.

DOMAINS.TITLE: Domains
DOMAINS.CONTENT: Domain registrations are subject to availability and are managed through third-party registrars.

RESELLER_HOSTING.TITLE: Reseller Hosting
RESELLER_HOSTING.CONTENT: Reseller accounts must follow our terms of fair usage and resource allocation.

VPS.TITLE: Virtual Private Servers
VPS.CONTENT: VPS resources are dedicated but shared hardware may affect performance.

SHARED_CLOUD_HOSTING.TITLE: Shared and Cloud Hosting
SHARED_CLOUD_HOSTING.CONTENT: Shared hosting comes with limits. Please upgrade if your site grows beyond plan resources.

DEDICATED_SERVERS.TITLE: Dedicated Servers
DEDICATED_SERVERS.CONTENT: You get full control over the server. Management services are optional.

BACKUPS.TITLE: Backups
BACKUPS.CONTENT: It is your responsibility to keep backups. We may provide automated backup options.

BILLING_REFUNDS.TITLE: Billing and Refunds
BILLING_REFUNDS.CONTENT: Billing occurs monthly or annually. Refunds are subject to our refund policy.

PROHIBITED_CONTENT.TITLE: Prohibited Content and Activities
PROHIBITED_CONTENT.CONTENT: You may not use our services for illegal, harmful, or abusive content.

TERMINATION.TITLE: Termination and Account Closure
TERMINATION.CONTENT: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate our terms.
